title: E-Commerce Platform
description: A full-stack e-commerce platform with modern UI and seamless shopping experience.
longDescription: Built a comprehensive e-commerce platform featuring product catalog, shopping cart, payment integration, and admin dashboard. Implemented real-time inventory management and order tracking system.

title: Task Management App
description: Collaborative task management application with real-time updates and team collaboration features.
longDescription: Developed a Kanban-style task management application with real-time synchronization, drag-and-drop functionality, and team collaboration features. Includes user authentication, role-based access control, and notification system.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: Beautiful weather dashboard with location-based forecasts and interactive maps.
longDescription: Created a responsive weather dashboard with location-based forecasts, interactive maps, and detailed weather analytics. Features include 7-day forecasts, hourly predictions, and weather alerts.

title: Social Media Analytics
description: Analytics dashboard for tracking social media performance and engagement metrics.
longDescription: Built an analytics dashboard that aggregates data from multiple social media platforms. Features include real-time metrics, customizable reports, and data visualization with interactive charts.

title: Fitness Tracker
description: Mobile-first fitness tracking application with workout plans and progress tracking.
longDescription: Developed a comprehensive fitness tracking app with workout plans, progress tracking, and social features. Includes exercise database, custom workout creation, and progress visualization.

title: Blog Platform
description: Modern blog platform with markdown support and beautiful typography.
longDescription: Created a full-featured blog platform with markdown support, syntax highlighting, and SEO optimization. Features include tag system, search functionality, and RSS feed generation.
